intro.speaker: Velouria
intro.line: Oooh, cool. There are so many acorns around here. *sniff* They have such a nice scent too. So earthy, so rich. I should find the very nicest one and give it to Daddy as a present. But maybe if I pick a fresh one from one of those trees... Huh? What's up there? Behind those branches? It looks like some sort of weird portal... *sniff, sniff* What? That scent! I'd recognize it anywhere. Smells like my daddy!

intro.speaker: Keaton
intro.line: We're almost there. Now, where is that darn portal exactly? My daughter, Velouria, is beyond it in her Deeprealm.

intro.speaker: Kaze
intro.line: I'm looking forward to meeting your daughter. You've said she's more like you than her mother—right down to the tail?

intro.speaker: Keaton
intro.line: Yup! Pretty much exactly like me. Except that she prefers her own company. A real lone wolf! She's not used to being around others. You might find her...overwhelming. She really wears her heart on her sleeve. Like, REALLY really.

intro.speaker: Kaze
intro.line: Wait, who's there?! Watch out—trouble approaches!

intro.speaker: Kaze
intro.line: What? It seems we're about to be ambushed.

intro.speaker: Keaton
intro.line: Not the best timing. I hate to keep Velouria waiting. But I'm game for a fight.

battle.speaker: Keaton
battle.line: Hrm? I'm picking up the slightest scent of wolfskin somewhere. To the...west? Yes! On the other side of those mountains! Who could it be...? Oh, no. It's Velouria. But how? I've never shown her where the portal is on her side. It can't be her. But that's definitely her scent coming from the west!

battle.speaker: Keaton
battle.line: *sniff* Velouria? By all the hair in my ears! What are you doing here?

battle.speaker: Velouria
battle.line: I was hunting for just the right gift for you when I caught your scent! Then I found the portal to your world! I can't believe I found you, my dear, daring, dashing Daddy!

battle.speaker: Keaton
battle.line: I, uh... Those are a lot of Ds. Let's save the tail-wagging until later, Velouria. We're in trouble here.

battle.speaker: Velouria
battle.line: Oh. Are we? How about I lend a hand? Or a paw? I've been perfecting my hunting skills off in my Deeprealm. I'm fiercer than the last time you saw me, Daddy.

end.speaker: Velouria
end.line: Aw, the hunt is over already... That was fun. Thanks for arranging such a nice game, Daddy.

end.speaker: Keaton
end.line: Um, that wasn't a game, Velouria. I'm not exactly happy to see you here. You could have been hurt.

end.speaker: Velouria
end.line: Daddy, I can see your tail wagging. I know you're happy to see me!

end.speaker: Keaton
end.line: Whuh? My tail's twitching, that's all. I'm actually very, very, very angry with you, Daughter.  Now, Velouria, I want you to scamper back to your Deeprealm. Off with you. I'm busy. You know the way out.

end.speaker: Velouria
end.line: No! I mean, yes. I'll watch my tone. But I'm not going back. I'm joining your pack, Daddy.

end.speaker: Keaton
end.line: Velouria, this isn't a pack. We're, uh, comrades-in-arms or something. No way. Never. Go, now!

end.speaker: Velouria
end.line: Huh, But, Daddy...I'm so confused. Your tail is wagging YES.

end.speaker: Velouria
end.line: Hey, I just remembered. Before I went through the portal, I found this for you. The perfect acorn!

end.speaker: Keaton
end.line: Wow! That's the prettiest acorn I've ever laid eyes on. So glossy! It's like a pearl! From a tree! Which reminds me. I have a gift for you too, Daughter. Here...

end.speaker: Velouria
end.line: Oh, wow! A bat? It's all shriveled. Its wings are ripped up. Did you chew on it? Daddy, it's perfect. You're wonderful.

end.speaker: Keaton
end.line: Er, am I? Sure, why not? I guess I am! But as far as you coming with us...? Oh, all right.

end.speaker: Keaton
end.line: Ha! That tickles, Velouria! All right, you're happy. I get it.

end.speaker: Velouria
end.line: I'm sorry. I'm just so glad to be part of your pack at last, Daddy.

end.speaker: Keaton
end.line: All right, all right. But it's not my pack, OK? That's not how this group works. *waggity, waggity, waggity* Ha! There goes my tail again. Welcome, Daughter! Welcome, welcome, welcome, welcome, welcome!

end.speaker: Velouria
end.line: OK, Daddy. Settle down. Now you're embarrassing me!
